nodes.bodyText:
In this case, do:
alpha1 = twt.getOptionalPhaseTapChanger().map(ptc -> Math.toRadians(ptc.getCurrentStep().getAlpha())).orElse(0f);

You can refactor it:
return twt.getRatedU2() / twt.getRatedU1() * twt.getOptionalRatioTapChanger().map(rtc -> rtc.getCurrentStep().getRho()).orElse(1);
